program.name: uudeview

item.para: UUDeview: check validity of save path upon 'p' (in interactive mode)
check return code of fclose() after writing target file to detect (e.g. disk full errors)
check for errors reading the input file
Get suspicious about potentially uuencoded data if the line length varies
write incomplete files, hoping for some block-level recovery
Add a UULoadFileWithPartNo function, in case a user of this library is certain of the part number and doesn't need to trust UUDeview's heuristics.
fix a bug in the historic Netscape fixing code
UUDeview: Add an alternative autorenamer that adds a unique sequence number before the first dot, keeping the extension intact
UUDeview: If the filename is "." or "..", replace the first dot with an underscore to not conflict with the directory names
finally implemented RFC 1522 header decoding. The charset is ignored, though.
fix some problems with decoding message/partial messages
In violation of RFC 1521, allow the [;] characters in a token. The Klez virus does that, and people who feed their virus scanners with the output from UUDeview would like to catch it.
fix bug in inews/inews.c: fgets doesn't discard the final newline
fix bug in parsing of header lines
fix fgets to accept lines that are exactly of the maximum length
fix two buffer overflows

note.para: No default domain or NNTP server has been configured. When posting, the environment variable NNTPSERVER must be set to the NNTP server name and the -r option must be specified to set the return address.
